tns:patch.author: nmandrescu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS v_menu_entry; DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_menu_entry; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_menu_entry AS SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.title, m.tooltip, CASE m.url WHEN null THEN m.url ELSE m.url END as url, m.flags, m.position, mv.view_type, mv.rule_id FROM amp_menu_entry m, amp_menu_entry_view mv WHERE m.id = mv.menu_id;
